0.title: CPU Usage

5.title: CPU Usage

6.title: CPU Usage

7.title: CPU Usage

16.query: data record("Virtual Machine Infrastructure Performance per Region")

rules.value: Virtual Machine Infrastructure Performance per Region

17.title: Network In (Bytes)
17.query:
timeseries avg(dt.cloud.azure.vm.network.bytes_in), by: { dt.entity.azure_vm }, filter: { matchesValue(azure.location, "centralus") }
| fieldsAdd dt.entity.azure_vm.name = entityName(dt.entity.azure_vm)
| fieldsAdd value.A = arrayAvg(`avg(dt.cloud.azure.vm.network.bytes_in)`)
| limit 20
